org.hps.record.daqconfig2019

Class FADCConfigHodo2019

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.daqconfig2019.IDAQConfig2019
      • org.hps.record.daqconfig2019.FADCConfigHodo2019

  • public class FADCConfigHodo2019
extends IDAQConfig2019
    Class FADCConfigHodo2019 stores Hodoscope FADC configuration settings parsed from the an EVIO file. This class manages the following properties:
    • FADC Mode
    • NSA
    • NSB
    • FADC Window Width
    • FADC Window Time Offset
    • Max Pulses per Channel Window
    • Gains
    • Thresholds
    • Pedestals
